Articles.Content:
has anyone out there produced a slightly more difficult tech tree than the default one? Preferably one that includes Kethane and possibly NovaPunch?

Yes, i know Kethane integration will be in a later release, but with creative persistent file editing, it can be added...I just dont have the hours required to learn, modify, test the creation of a custom tech tree... I am just hoping there is a thread or a repository for such tech tree files...

Thanks guys !

Look here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53192-0-22-TreeLoader-Custom-Career-Tech-tree-Loader-1-0

It looks like many major mods are using it, and I think NovaPunch and Kethane are among them.
